name: The Scary Forest
description:
This is a horror game that is inspired by Five Nights at Freddy’ s(story), Dark Deception(gameplay), Slenderman(gameplay). To beat this game you need to collect all five papers around the map and then you have won, but in this game there is a hidden mystery behind all of this so good luck solving it. About updates: This game will not have any updates in the future. If players find some bugs or mistakes in the game then game will receive new update which will fix those mistakes/bugs

 

Creator: Maker of the game – Erik Strumberger

Models – Unity asset store

Textures – CC0 textures

Music, sound effects, girls voice – from youtube

Man’s voice – Erik Strumberger

Inspired by - Five Nights at Freddy’ s(story), Dark Deception(gameplay), Slenderman(gameplay)

 

How to download:

  • Download zip file
  • Extract zip file
  • Open icon with name “The Scary Forest.exe”
